Review Text: I absolutely love these scrunchies. I’ve used them every single day since I got them and they’ve held up amazing. They still feel and look like when I first got them. I have waist length, thick hair and these have no issues holding it up. Plus the silk helps not to damage your hair.

Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah
Kristin Ess
['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!']
{'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'}
[[VIDEOID:1caeab65346b101dab4627efe802e13f]] This has no stretch whatsoever. It’s literally just a super tight hair tie wrapped in a bunch of extra, unnecessary fabric. I have waist length hair and only use scrunchies because it’s the only thing that stretches enough and holds my hair. This is not it ladies.
Absolutely not
Arqumi Shower Cap for Women, Polyester Satin Shower Cap, Waterproof Pattern Shower Cap Bath Cap with Elastic Band, Wine Red
Arqumi
{'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 6.06 x 1.85 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
I struggled with finding a shower cap that could actually hold all of my hair. I have waist-length, thick hair and this held it perfectly well. It kept all of my hair inside and didn’t get wet at all. It’s good thick material, I definitely recommend for those with long and thick hair.
For long hair.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Accessories Preference:** The user continues to favor practical hair accessories that effectively manage thick, long hair, choosing items that provide a secure hold, like the recently purchased silk scrunchies.
- **Material Sensitivity:** They show a strong preference for stretchy and comfortable materials, consistently opting for products that do not cause discomfort. Their positive experience with silk scrunchies demonstrates a liking for soft, quality materials that are gentle on the hair.
- **Quality Expectations:** The user maintains high standards for product performance, often rating items based on how well they meet these expectations. Their enthusiastic feedback on the scrunchies indicates a continued appreciation for durability and functionality.
- **Product Rating Pattern:** They provide honest, experience-based reviews, placing emphasis on both functionality and quality. The recent review for the scrunchies reflects their commitment to high-quality accessories.
- **Focus on Functionality:** The user prioritizes items that securely manage waist-length, thick hair while ensuring ease of use. Their consistent positive experiences with various accessories reinforce this trend.
- **Recent Interaction Reflection:** The user’s last interaction, reinforcing their satisfaction with durable products that protect their hair, highlights their ongoing commitment to reliable beauty solutions that blend quality, comfort, and effectiveness.

Overall, their interactions demonstrate a steadfast appreciation for practical, high-quality beauty products, with a consistent focus on functionality and comfort.
